The height of the JIP surfaces also drops gradually from class I 1 to class I 4, i.e., the space-time dependence is higher among smaller incidences than among larger ones, and the incidence class I 1 has the most significant contribution to the strength of the space-time HFRS dependence measured by JIP compared to the other three classes.
